def_cn: (用于疑问句，询问人的姓名或身份)谁
def_en: You use whom in questions when you ask about the name or identity of a person or group of people.

def_cn: (尤用于某些动词和形容词后，引导谈论某人或某一群人的姓名或身份的从句)谁
def_en: You use whom after certain words, especially verbs and adjectives, to introduce a clause where you talk about the name or identity of a person or a group of people.

def_cn: (用于进行限定说明或提供更多信息的关系从句的句首)
def_en: You use whom at the beginning of a relative clause when specifying the person or group of people you are talking about or when giving more information about them.  →see usage note at:who
